Interface Store

All Known Implementing Classes:
StoreIMP
public interface Store
This is the main interface for the A03 Final Project, representing the management of a store
.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      int addUser(String _name)
      This method attempts to add a customer to the store
      Parameters:
      _name - - The name of the customer.
      Returns:
      Whether the customer could be added or not.

    • removeUser

      int removeUser(int _userID)
      This method attempts to remove a customer from the store
      Parameters:
      _userID - - The ID of the customer.
      Returns:
      (-1) if customer does not exist; (-2) if not possible to remove as it has active purchases; 0 if removed.

    • displayUserInfo

      void displayUserInfo(int _userID)
      This method attempts to display the customer info on the screen
      Parameters:
      _userID - - The ID of the customer.

    • displayAllUserIDs

      void displayAllUserIDs()
      This method displays all customer IDs on the screen

    • addPlayer

      int addPlayer(String name, int age, String club, String country, int rating, double cost)
      This method attempts to add a player to the store
      Parameters:
      name - - The name of the player.
      age - - The age of the player.
      club - - The club of the player.
      country - - The country of the player.
      rating - - The rating of the player.
      cost - - The cost of the player.
      Returns:
      The ID of the player created.

    • addManager

      int addManager(String name, int age, String club, String country, int rating, double cost)
      This method attempts to add a manager to the store
      Parameters:
      name - - The name of the manager.
      age - - The age of the manager.
      club - - The club of the manager.
      country - - The country of the manager.
      rating - - The rating of the manager.
      cost - - The cost of the manager.
      Returns:
      The ID of the manager created.

    • removeItem

      boolean removeItem(int _itemID)
      This method attempts to remove a card from the store
      Parameters:
      _itemID - - The ID of the card.
      Returns:
      Whether the card could be removed or not.

    • displayItemInfo

      void displayItemInfo(int _itemID)
      This method attempts to display the card info on the screen
      Parameters:
      _itemID - - The ID of the card.

    • displayAllItemIDs

      void displayAllItemIDs()
      This method displays all card IDs on the screen

    • topUpBalance

      double topUpBalance(int _userID, double balance)

    • withdrawBalance

      double withdrawBalance(int _userID, double balance)

    • showBalance

      double showBalance(int _userID)

    • showCost

      double showCost(int _itemID)

    • PurchaseItem

      int PurchaseItem(int _userID, int _itemID)
      This method attempts to purchase a card of the store
      Parameters:
      _userID - - The ID of the customer purchasing the card.
      _itemID - - The ID of the card to be purchased.
      Returns:
      The ID of the purchase being performed (-1 if not possible to purchase).

    • returnItem

      boolean returnItem(int _userID, int _itemID)
      This method attempts to sell a card of the store
      Parameters:
      _userID - - The ID of the customer selling the card.
      _itemID - - The ID of the card to be sold.
      Returns:
      Whether the card is successfully sold or not.

    • loadContentFromDisk

      boolean loadContentFromDisk(String usersFileName, String itemsFileName)
      This method attempts to load the customers, cards and purchases of the store from disk.
      Parameters:
      usersFileName - - The name of the database file for customers.
      itemsFileName - - The name of the database file for cards.
      Returns:
      Whether the content is loaded or not.

    • saveContentToDisk

      boolean saveContentToDisk(String usersFileName, String itemsFileName)
      This method attempts to save the customers, cards and purchases of the store to disk.
      Parameters:
      usersFileName - - The name of the database file for customers.
      itemsFileName - - The name of the database file for cards.
      Returns:
      Whether the content is saved or not.
